name: No Match For A Cheater
description:
ATOM Game Jam #2'de 72 saat içinde yapılmıştır.

Nazmi Güler | Music, Art, Coder, Concept
Dağhan Telli | Coder, Concept
Egemen Gürsoy | Concept, Story

No Match For A Cheater is a game designed solely for cheaters. You may only pass by cheating. Good Luck Enjoy.

No Assets were used, all music and art done by us two indie developers in 48 hours.
Gameplay video is added. Our first time using unity.

Controls:
W A S D For movement. Aim to shoot. E to interract, R to restart. 

DISCLAIMER:
You are expected to die at one stage. 
To insert the given cheat code, you must press all the given keys at once.
